thread.title: Wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel - Review of Hotel Banke, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lauriejpalmer
title: Wonderful hotel
text:
I spent three nights here on my way back from Egypt. I have to say that the hotel was lovely. The staff was professional, kind and very friendly. The food was excellent. They were very attentive and assisted me with maps and metro directions. Most of the staff spoke excellent English which I deeply appreciated as my French is not particularly good. I highly recommend staying here. It was near the opera, wonderful shopping and cafes and just two blocks from the metro.
